column4: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Refused (Col. 4)
column5: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False/ Mistake of Fact or Law etc. (Col. 5)
column6: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col. 6)
column7: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Charge Sheets were Submitted (Col. 7)
column8: Percentage of Cases to Total Cases for Investigation in which - Investigation was Completed - Total (Col. 5 + Col. 6 + Col. 7) = (Col. 8)

column2: SC/ ST Prev. of Atrocities Act
